org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.flex

Class FlexTextGraphicNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.AbstractFXGNode
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.GraphicContentNode
        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.TextGraphicNode
          • org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.flex.FlexTextGraphicNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFXGNode, IMaskableNode, IPreserveWhiteSpaceNode, ITextNode

    public class FlexTextGraphicNode
extends TextGraphicNode
    A Flex specific override for TextGraphicNode used to capture the attributes specified on a <TextGraphic> node in FXG 1.0.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.TextGraphicNode

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GraphicContext createGraphicContext()
      Since TextGraphic is converted to a sprite based ActionScript class and rendered using Flex's RichText API, we do not report attributes on the graphic context that are going to be set as properties in ActionScript (as otherwise you would end up with duplicate transformations).
      void setAttribute(String name, String value, Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
      Flex specific override to keep track of the attributes set on this TextGraphic node.
      void setDocumentNode(IFXGNode root)
      If the document root is a FlexGraphicNode, it records that the document makes use of TextGraphic and thus will need to generate symbol classes to programmatically draw the text (as there is no equivalent to TextGraphic in SWF).

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.TextGraphicNode

        addChild, addContentChild, addTextProperty, getChildren, getNodeName, getTextAttributes, getTextChildren, getTextProperties, rememberAttribute

    • Method Detail

      • setAttribute

        public void setAttribute(String name,
                String value,
                Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Flex specific override to keep track of the attributes set on this TextGraphic node.
        Specified by:
        setAttribute in interface IFXGNode
        Overrides:
        setAttribute in class TextGraphicNode
        Parameters:
        name - the attribute name
        value - the attribute value
        problems - problem collection used to collect problems occurred within this method
        See Also:
        TextGraphicNode.setAttribute(String, String, Collection), AbstractTextNode.setAttribute(String, String, Collection)

      • setDocumentNode

        public void setDocumentNode(IFXGNode root)
        If the document root is a FlexGraphicNode, it records that the document makes use of TextGraphic and thus will need to generate symbol classes to programmatically draw the text (as there is no equivalent to TextGraphic in SWF).
        Specified by:
        setDocumentNode in interface IFXGNode
        Overrides:
        setDocumentNode in class AbstractFXGNode
        Parameters:
        root - - the root node of the FXG document.

      • createGraphicContext

        public GraphicContext createGraphicContext()
        Since TextGraphic is converted to a sprite based ActionScript class and rendered using Flex's RichText API, we do not report attributes on the graphic context that are going to be set as properties in ActionScript (as otherwise you would end up with duplicate transformations).

        The ignored graphic context attributes include: 

         x="..."
 y="..."
 scaleX="..."
 scaleY="..."
 rotation="..."
 blendMode="..."
 alpha="..."

        Overrides:
        createGraphicContext in class GraphicContentNode
